options: ['Because he often eats chicken hamburgers.', 'Because he often gets a toy car.', 'Because he often makes people laugh.', 'Because he often goes there.']
questions: Why do people working in KFC know David?
article: David likes to eat in KFC. He often eats a chicken hamburger and French fries. Most people working in KFC know David very well. Sometimes they often ask him, "How many times do you eat chicken hamburgers and French fries a week?" David will answer, "Three times a week." "Why do you like KFC better?" They ask. "Because every time I can get a small toy car." People around him laugh and say, "Why don't you go to the toy store ? " "Because in the toy store they don't have KFC."
